001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.viewmodel;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
004import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
005import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
006import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
007import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.User;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service.UserRepository;
010import javax.inject.Inject;
011
012/**
013 * ViewModel class for managing user data.
014 */
015@HiltViewModel
016public class UserViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
017
018  private final UserRepository userRepository;
019  private final MutableLiveData<User> user;
020
021  /**
022   * Constructs a UserViewModel using the provided userRepository.
023   *
024   * @param userRepository The repository used to get user data.
025   */
026  @Inject
027  public UserViewModel(UserRepository userRepository) {
028    this.userRepository = userRepository;
029    user = new MutableLiveData<>();
030    this.userRepository.getCurrentUser()
031        .doOnSuccess(user::postValue)
032        .subscribe();
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Returns the LivaData used to store a user.
037   *
038   * @return LiveData containing the current User.
039   */
040  public LiveData<User> getUser() {
041    return user;
042  }
043
044}
